title: Multi-step proposal to upgrade mainnet framework to v1.4.0
description: This includes changes outlined in https://github.com/aptos-labs/aptos-core/releases/aptos-node-v1.4.0. The following will be enabled in separate proposals: (AIP-25) Struct constructor, (AIP-20) generic cryptography algebra, (AIP-23) ed25519 returns false if wrong length, (AIP-26) quorum store, and (AIP-27) transaction shuffling
